product_name: REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry Crew Shirt - Men's
long_description: Built for hiking, skiing, snowshoeing or Nordic skiing, the men's REI Midweight Polartec(R) Power Dry(R) crew offers the perfect mix of warmth and comfort. Polartec Power Dry utilizes 2 different yarns on either side of the fabric to enhance comfort: interior yarn wicks moisture, and exterior yarn dries quickly. Combination of the 2 yarns helps keep you dry during highly aerobic activities because it moves moisture away from skin faster than single-component fabrics such as cotton. Fabric offers UPF rating of 30 to protect against harmful UV light. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin, and raglan seams are designed to work with pack straps at shoulders. Underarm and side gussets promote freedom of motion and reduce chafing under a hipbelt. Additional length helps garment stay tucked in, and smooth texture of outer surface makes it easy to slide on extra layers. The men's REI Midweight Polartec Power Dry crew features a next-to-skin fit that hugs the body.
